docs.lead_paragraph: In what she describes as her "new life," Li Na is dealing with morning sickness, hoping for a baby girl and dreaming of becoming a housewife. The two-time Grand Slam champion says she will try not to tell her future child that she was once one of the world's best tennis players.

headline.main: Li Na Talks About Tennis, Retirement and Her Future Baby
headline.print_headline: Li Na Talks About Tennis, Retirement and Her Future Baby

docs.snippet: In what she describes as her "new life," Li Na is dealing with morning sickness, hoping for a baby girl and dreaming of becoming a housewife. The two-time Grand Slam champion says she will try not to tell her future child that she was once one of the...

docs.lead_paragraph: State battles continue over aggressive limitations, and bills with bad old ideas are introduced in the new Republican-controlled Congress.

headline.main: A Perilous Year for Abortion Rights
headline.print_headline: A Perilous Year for Abortion Rights

docs.abstract: Editorial warns that 2015 is likely to be yet another dangerous year for women's constitutionally protected abortion rights; decries wave of aggressive new restrictions being applied at the state level along with crop of ill-conceived bills introduced in the new Republican-controlled Congress; argues that trends highlight conservatives' ongoing war against women.
docs.snippet: State battles continue over aggressive limitations, and bills with bad old ideas are introduced in the new Republican-controlled Congress.

docs.lead_paragraph: An estranged Florida couple's fight over whether to circumcise their son has become a rallying cry for those who denounce the procedure as barbaric.

headline.main: Fla. Boy's Circumcision Spurs Lengthy Legal Battle, Protests
headline.print_headline: Fla. Boy's Circumcision Spurs Lengthy Legal Battle, Protests

docs.snippet: An estranged Florida couple's fight over whether to circumcise their son has become a rallying cry for those who denounce the procedure as barbaric.

docs.lead_paragraph: A senior Cabinet minister in Ireland says he's gay, becoming the first openly homosexual government figure in the history of the traditionally conservative Catholic country.

headline.main: Irish Cabinet Minister Announces He's Gay
headline.print_headline: Irish Cabinet Minister Announces He's Gay

docs.snippet: A senior Cabinet minister in Ireland says he's gay, becoming the first openly homosexual government figure in the history of the traditionally conservative Catholic country.

docs.lead_paragraph: A movement is raising soul-searching questions about international adoption.

headline.main: Why a Generation of Adoptees Is Returning to South Korea

docs.abstract: Adoptee Solidarity Korea, group formed by Koreans who were given up for adoption and ended up with families overseas, most in United States, has lobbied for legislation in South Korea that has reduced flow of Korean children out of country; group's success has led to similar movements in other nations, all of them questioning concept of international adoption.
docs.snippet: A movement is raising soul-searching questions about international adoption.

docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands of dollars of donations have poured in from around the world to help pay for the care for newborn quadruplets of a Phoenix mother who died after giving birth to them, a fundraising website set up in the woman's name announced on Saturday.

headline.main: Donations Pour In for Phoenix Newborn Quadruplets After Mom Dies
headline.print_headline: Donations Pour In for Phoenix Newborn Quadruplets After Mom Dies

docs.snippet: Thousands of dollars of donations have poured in from around the world to help pay for the care for newborn quadruplets of a Phoenix mother who died after giving birth to them, a fundraising website set up in the woman's name announced on Saturday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman died hours after giving birth to quadruplets at a Phoenix hospital, a close friend of the family said Saturday.

headline.main: Phoenix Woman Dies After Giving Birth to Quadruplets
headline.print_headline: Phoenix Woman Dies After Giving Birth to Quadruplets

docs.snippet: A woman died hours after giving birth to quadruplets at a Phoenix hospital, a close friend of the family said Saturday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Almost everybody has a favorite Rick Perry moment, and we all might get to revisit them during the 2016 campaign.

headline.main: Texas Is Sending You a Present
headline.print_headline: Texas Is Sending You a Present

docs.abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column examines actions and faux pas committed by Texas Gov Rick Perry during his years in office; notes that Perry has stepped down but has not further elucidated his potential presidential ambitions.
docs.snippet: Almost everybody has a favorite Rick Perry moment, and we all might get to revisit them during the 2016 campaign.
